pr_title: Add our Org attributes to parent POM

timeline.message:
Add our Org attributes to parent POM

and full details on scm

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps the organization should be CS&S instead?
timeline.author: wetneb
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -10,6 +10,38 @@
   <name>OpenRefine</name>
   <description>OpenRefine is a free, open source power tool for working with messy data and improving it</description>
   <url>http://openrefine.org/</url>
+  <organization>
+    <name>OpenRefine</name>
+    <url>http://openrefine.org/</url>

replies.bodyText:
Dunno.  This statement could be anything:

Most projects are run by some sort of organization (business, private group, etc.). Here is where the most basic information is set.

I think the key word is "run".  CS&S is a fiscal sponsor, they don't "run" OpenRefine project.
examples: https://github.com/search?l=&p=2&q=%3Corganization%3E+extension%3Apom&ref=advsearch&type=Code
Some have foundations:
  <organization>
    <name>Apache Software Foundation</name>
    <url>http://groovy-lang.org</url>
  </organization>
Others have the project:
      <organization>
        <name>XmlBeans</name>
        <url>http://xmlbeans.apache.org/</url>
    </organization>
replies.author: thadguidry

replies.bodyText: Since we already have the project name and URL in the main fields for that, I think it'd be nice to put CS&S there - it would make the metadata a bit richer
